originalText.text: Loved working with Tony and being represented by him! Very responsive and accommodating. Especially loved the open lines of communication. A great positive attitude while keeping it real. Also tenacious by keeping at it during the cold winter months to get interest and buzz on the property. Truly a pleasure and wouldn’t hesitate in working with him again to buy or sell. I highly recommend him any day.

text.text: Loved working with Tony and being represented by him! Very responsive and accommodating. Especially loved the open lines of communication. A great positive attitude while keeping it real. Also tenacious by keeping at it during the cold winter months to get interest and buzz on the property. Truly a pleasure and wouldn’t hesitate in working with him again to buy or sell. I highly recommend him any day.

originalText.text: Tony took great care of us during the selling process from start to finish at a time many would would say was the worst time to sell a house, during the early pandemic. He gave us tips on what we could do to increase the selling price, advocated for us to make sure we got a competitive negotiated price and he made us feel reassured when he kept us in the loop every step of the process. I couldn’t of asked for a better realtor. I recommend him to my network and have discussions with him on investment properties I plan to buy in the future. If you’re looking for someone who knows the industry, neighborhoods, has great experience and treats customers as a priority, he’s your guy.

originalText.text: I had a great experience working with Tony and would highly recommend his services. He is very professional, extremely responsive and ultimately helped me to be stress-free about the rental process. And may I add due to my unique situation, he was so patient throughout the process and truly appreciated his advice and market expertise.

text.text: I had a great experience working with Tony and would highly recommend his services. He is very professional, extremely responsive and ultimately helped me to be stress-free about the rental process. And may I add due to my unique situation, he was so patient throughout the process and truly appreciated his advice and market expertise.

originalText.text: Tony was super helpful throughout the very stressful process of finding an apartment. He listened to what we wanted in an apartment and found us a perfect spot. He was also really responsive and calmed our nerves during the application process. Definitely would recommend!

text.text: Tony was super helpful throughout the very stressful process of finding an apartment. He listened to what we wanted in an apartment and found us a perfect spot. He was also really responsive and calmed our nerves during the application process. Definitely would recommend!

originalText.text: Tony is a great agent. He showed me several good options. He is both easy-going and hardworking. Tony makes the stressful experience of moving out a lot more manageable. I will recommend him to everybody looking for a NYC appartment or studio.
